amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for EDA by $80 million (by transfer), bringing the total amount available for EDA up to $255 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 153 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the the Census by $80 million and increasing EDA by $80 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Michaud amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 305 - 127 (Roll no. 50).
